alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Chase; Frontier; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:53AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northwestern Frontier, Perkins, eastern Keith, eastern Chase, southwestern Lincoln, southwestern McPherson and Hayes Counties through 230 AM CDT/130 AM MDT/... At 153 AM CDT/1253 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Roscoe to near Imperial to Palisade. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Paxton, Wallace, Madrid, Elsie, Dickens, Keystone, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Sarben, Enders, Roscoe, Hamlet, Center Dam Campground, Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Grainton and Nevens. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 27 and 83. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 128 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Chase; Frontier; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins
